function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulties in estimating population size of individual WWTP catchments","Impact":"Higher uncertainties in smaller populations and unaccounted for unique population fluctuations","Mitigation":"Employ techniques to reduce uncertainties associated with population size, such as investigating hydrochemical parameters","Technologies":"Hydrochemical analysis methods for parameters like COD, BOD, and NH4+","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Influence of wastewater composition on hydrochemical parameters","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of populations contributing to a WWTP catchment","Mitigation":"Consider the influence of wastewater composition on parameter analysis and adjust estimation methods accordingly","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater composition analysis techniques","People":"Environmental engineers, wastewater treatment experts","Owner":"Environmental agencies, wastewater treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Uncertainties associated with sample collection and analytical variability","Impact":"Reduced reliability and credibility of studies","Mitigation":"Development and adoption of reliable, standardized methods for sample collection and analysis","Technologies":"Standardized sample collection and analysis protocols","People":"Researchers, environmental scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory agencies"}]}
